description: laboratory equipment - gas chromatograph, autosampler, computer monitor and software
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
**Reference Number:** cb-6740-42768184
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** 2020-060
**Publication Date:** 2023-06-27
**Closing Date:** 2023-07-31T17:00:00
**Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-06-19
**Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-03-31

## Tender Details

* **Goods and Services:** Laboratory Scientific Equipment
* **Item Description:** Two (2) gas chromatograph, two (2) 250 sample autosampler, two (2) computer and monitor with associated software
* **Installation and Commissioning:** On-site installation within 30 days of receipt
* **Training:** Training for up to 4 users must be delivered as part of installation visit/process
* **Warranty:** One (1) year warranty on parts and labor, with the option of extending the manufacturer’s warranty by an extra year, for a total of two (2) years
* **Preventative Maintenance:** Option for three (3) years of preventative maintenance after the warranty expires

## Eligibility and Requirements

* **Pre-qualified Suppliers:** Suppliers currently pre-qualified on Supply Arrangement #E60PV-19EQUI have been invited to bid
* **No New Bid Submission:** Suppliers not pre-qualified under the supply arrangement cannot submit a bid

## Additional Information

* **Notice Type:** Not Applicable
* **Trade Agreements:** Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and others
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada, Prince Edward Island, Nova Scotia
* **Regions of Delivery:** Canada, Prince Edward Island, Nova Scotia
* **Contact Information:** Jean-François Lemay, jean-francois.lemay@agr.gc.ca, (343) 571-9706

## Document Availability
The tender package is available for download on Buy and Sell Canada.

Note that I rewrote the original text into a more professional and concise format while maintaining all the relevant information. I also ensured that the original text is preserved in the rewritten version to avoid any discrepancies. Please let me know if you need any further assistance.
